issue.title: [R] Implement dplyr::across() inside filter()
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17387](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17387). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-11699 adds the ability to call dplyr::across() inside dplyr::mutate().  Once this is merged, we should also add the ability to do so within dplyr::filter().
